mapper.select: -- retrievePrjClsDtl 프로젝트 월마감 상세조회 SELECT A.PRJ_CD as "prjCd" , A.WBS_CD as "wbsCd" , ISNULL(A.PRJ_CLS_YN,'N') as "prjClsYn" /*마감여부*/ , A.PGS_STAT_CD as "pgsStatCd" /*진척상태*/ --, dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('PGS_STAT_CD', C.PGS_STAT_CD) as "pgsStatNm" /*진척상태명*/ , A.PRJ_CLS_YYMM as "prjClsYymm" /*마감월*/ , A.PRJ_CLS_SBC as "prjClsSbc" /*마감내용*/ , A.FNO_PLN as "fnoPln" /*지연내역 및 향후계획*/ , A.ATTC_FIL_ID as "attcFilId" /*첨부파일ID*/ FROM IRIS_PRJ_RSST_CLS A WHERE A.PRJ_CD = #{prjCd} AND A.PRJ_CLS_YYMM = #{searchMonth}

-- retrieveTssPgsSearchInfo SELECT Z.PRJ_CD AS prjCd , Z.WBS_CD AS wbsCd --WBS CODE(보여주기) , Z.PK_WBS_CD AS pkWbsCd --WBS CODE(내부관리) , Z.TSS_CD AS tssCd --과제코드 , CASE WHEN Z.PGS_STEP_CD != 'AL' THEN Z.TSS_NM ELSE Z.AL_TSS_NM END AS tssNm --과제명 , CASE WHEN Z.PGS_STEP_CD != 'AL' THEN Z.PRJ_NM ELSE Z.AL_PRJ_NM END AS prjNm --소속명(프로젝트명) , CASE WHEN Z.PGS_STEP_CD != 'AL' THEN SUBSTRING(Z.DEPT_NAME, 1, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('.', Z.DEPT_NAME) <= 0 THEN LEN(Z.DEPT_NAME) ELSE CHARINDEX('.', Z.DEPT_NAME)-1 END) ELSE SUBSTRING(Z.AL_DEPT_NAME, 1, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('.', Z.AL_DEPT_NAME) <= 0 THEN LEN(Z.AL_DEPT_NAME) ELSE CHARINDEX('.', Z.AL_DEPT_NAME)-1 END) END AS deptName --조직 , CASE WHEN Z.PGS_STEP_CD != 'AL' THEN Z.TSS_STRT_DD ELSE Z.AL_TSS_STRT_DD END AS tssStrtDd --과제기간시작 , CASE WHEN Z.PGS_STEP_CD != 'AL' THEN Z.TSS_FNH_DD ELSE Z.AL_TSS_FNH_DD END AS tssFnhDd --과제기간종료 , CASE WHEN Z.PGS_STEP_CD = 'DC' THEN Z.DCAC_B_STRT_DD WHEN Z.PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' THEN Z.CMPL_B_STRT_DD END AS cmplNxStrtDd --과제실적시작 , CASE WHEN Z.PGS_STEP_CD = 'DC' THEN Z.DCAC_B_FNH_DD WHEN Z.PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' THEN Z.CMPL_B_FNH_DD END AS cmplNxFnhDd --과제실적종료 , Z.TSS_ST AS tssSt --상태 , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('TSS_ST', Z.TSS_ST) AS tssStNm --상태명 , Z.FRST_RGST_DT AS frstRgstDt --최종실적등록일 , CASE WHEN Z.PGS_STEP_CD != 'AL' THEN Z.SA_SABUN_NAME ELSE Z.AL_SA_SABUN_NAME END AS saUserName --과제리더명 , Z.PGS_STEP_CD AS pgsStepCd --진행상태코드(PL:계획, PG:진행, CM:완료, AL: 변경, DC:중단) , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('PGS_STEP_CD',Z.PGS_STEP_CD) AS pgsStepNm --진행상태명 , Z.TSS_NOS_ST AS tssNosSt --과제차수상태코드(1차년도, 2 차년도, 3 차년도, 4차년도, 5차년도:국책과제) , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('TSS_NOS_ST',Z.TSS_NOS_ST) AS tssNosStNm --과제차수상태명 , Z.GRS_EV_ST AS grsEvSt --GRS상태 , Z.MY_TSS AS myTss , Z.PROGRESSRATEREAL AS progressrateReal , Z.PROGRESSRATE AS progressrate FROM (SELECT M.PRJ_CD , M.WBS_CD AS WBS_CD , M.PK_WBS_CD AS PK_WBS_CD , M.TSS_CD AS TSS_CD , M.TSS_NM AS TSS_NM , B.TSS_NM AS AL_TSS_NM , SUBSTRING(ISNULL(DBO.FN_GETNAMEONTSSPGSSTEP(M.TSS_CD, 'PRJ', M.PRJ_CD), M.PRJ_NM) , CHARINDEX('.', ISNULL(DBO.FN_GETNAMEONTSSPGSSTEP(M.TSS_CD, 'PRJ', M.PRJ_CD), M.PRJ_NM))+1 , LEN(ISNULL(DBO.FN_GETNAMEONTSSPGSSTEP(M.TSS_CD, 'PRJ', M.PRJ_CD), M.PRJ_NM))) AS PRJ_NM , SUBSTRING(DBO.FN_GETPRJNAME(B.PRJ_CD), CHARINDEX('.', DBO.FN_GETPRJNAME(B.PRJ_CD))+1, LEN(DBO.FN_GETPRJNAME(B.PRJ_CD))) AS AL_PRJ_NM , SUBSTRING(M.PRJ_NM, CHARINDEX('.', M.PRJ_NM)+1, LEN(M.PRJ_NM)) AS CM_PRJ_NM , ISNULL(DBO.FN_GETNAMEONTSSPGSSTEP(M.TSS_CD, 'DEPT', M.DEPT_CODE), M.DEPT_NAME) AS DEPT_NAME , ISNULL(DBO.FN_GETNAMEONTSSPGSSTEP(B.TSS_CD, 'DEPT', B.DEPT_CODE), B.DEPT_NAME) AS AL_DEPT_NAME , M.TSS_STRT_DD AS TSS_STRT_DD , B.TSS_STRT_DD AS AL_TSS_STRT_DD , M.TSS_FNH_DD AS TSS_FNH_DD , B.TSS_FNH_DD AS AL_TSS_FNH_DD , M.DCAC_B_STRT_DD AS DCAC_B_STRT_DD , M.CMPL_B_STRT_DD AS CMPL_B_STRT_DD , M.DCAC_B_FNH_DD AS DCAC_B_FNH_DD , M.CMPL_B_FNH_DD AS CMPL_B_FNH_DD , M.TSS_ST AS TSS_ST , M.FRST_RGST_DT AS FRST_RGST_DT , ISNULL(DBO.FN_GETNAMEONTSSPGSSTEP(M.TSS_CD, 'USER', M.SA_SABUN_NEW), M.SA_SABUN_NAME) AS SA_SABUN_NAME , ISNULL(DBO.FN_GETNAMEONTSSPGSSTEP(B.TSS_CD, 'USER', B.SA_SABUN_NEW), B.SA_SABUN_NAME) AS AL_SA_SABUN_NAME , M.PGS_STEP_CD AS PGS_STEP_CD , M.TSS_NOS_ST AS TSS_NOS_ST , (SELECT TOP 1 X.GRS_EV_ST FROM IRIS_GRS_EV_RSLT_RGST X WHERE X.TSS_CD = M.TSS_CD ORDER BY X.TSS_CD_SN DESC) AS GRS_EV_ST , CASE WHEN A.PL_EMP_NO = #{_userSabun} OR M.SA_SABUN_NEW = #{_userSabun} OR B.SA_SABUN_NEW = #{_userSabun} OR M.TSS_CD IN (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR X WHERE X.SA_SABUN_NEW = #{_userSabun}) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MY_TSS -- 실적(WBS) /목표 -진척율 , CONCAT(ISNULL((SELECT IIF(A.ARSL_CD='','0' , ROUND( A.ARSL_CD,1)) FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_WBS A WHERE A.TSS_CD = (SELECT MAX(PG.TSS_CD) --다건발생경우 ERROR발생 FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST PG WHERE PG.PK_WBS_CD = M.PK_WBS_CD AND PG.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG') AND A.WBS_SN = 1), 0), '/', --목표 (전달의 마지막날로 계산) (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(IIF(A.FNH_DT < (CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 126)), A.WGVL, ROUND(CONVERT(FLOAT,A.WGVL / DATEDIFF(DD, CONVERT(DATE, STRT_DT), CONVERT(DATE, FNH_DT))) * IIF(DATEDIFF(DD, CONVERT(DATE, STRT_DT),GETDATE() ) <0 , 0 , DATEDIFF(DD, CONVERT(DATE, STRT_DT),GETDATE())), 1) )), 100) -- 전달의 마지막날로 계산 FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_WBS A WHERE A.TSS_CD = M.TSS_CD AND A.DEPTH = 1 AND ((CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 126) BETWEEN A.STRT_DT AND A.FNH_DT) OR A.FNH_DT < (CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 126))))) AS PROGRESSRATE --진척율 -- 실적(WBS) /목표 -신호등 , CONCAT(ISNULL((SELECT IIF(A.ARSL_CD='','0' , A.ARSL_CD) FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_WBS A WHERE A.TSS_CD = (SELECT MAX(PG.TSS_CD) FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST PG WHERE PG.PK_WBS_CD = M.PK_WBS_CD AND PG.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG') AND A.WBS_SN=1),0), '/', --목표 (전달의 마지막날로 계산) (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(IIF(A.FNH_DT < (CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 126)) , A.WGVL , ROUND(CONVERT(FLOAT,A.WGVL /DATEDIFF(DD, CONVERT(DATE, STRT_DT), CONVERT(DATE, FNH_DT))) * IIF( DATEDIFF(DD, CONVERT(DATE, STRT_DT), DATEADD(D,-DAY(GETDATE()),GETDATE()) ) <0 , 0 , DATEDIFF(DD, CONVERT(DATE, STRT_DT), DATEADD(D,-DAY(GETDATE()),GETDATE()) )) ,1) ) ),100) -- 전달의 마지막날로 계산 FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_WBS A WHERE A.TSS_CD = M.TSS_CD AND A.DEPTH= 1 AND ((CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 126) BETWEEN A.STRT_DT AND A.FNH_DT) OR A.FNH_DT < (CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 126))))) AS PROGRESSRATEREAL --진척(신호등) , CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(M.PK_WBS_CD, 1, 1) = 'G' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS R_NUM FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST M /*과제관리마스터*/ LEFT JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST A /*프로젝트연구마스터*/ ON M.PRJ_CD = A.PRJ_CD LEFT JOIN (SELECT PK_WBS_CD, WBS_CD, TSS_STRT_DD, TSS_FNH_DD, TSS_NM, PRJ_CD, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, TSS_CD, SA_SABUN_NAME, SA_SABUN_NEW FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST WHERE PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND TSS_SCN_CD = 'G' ) B ON M.PK_WBS_CD = B.PK_WBS_CD WHERE M.TSS_CD IN (SELECT TSS_CD FROM (SELECT PK_WBS_CD, TSS_CD, STEPRANK , RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY X.PK_WBS_CD ORDER BY X.STEPRANK ASC, TSS_CD DESC) AS OVER_STEP_RANK FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' OR PGS_STEP_CD = 'DC' THEN 1 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND TSS_ST = '100' THEN 2 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND (TSS_ST = '101' OR TSS_ST = '102') THEN 3 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'AL' THEN 4 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND TSS_ST != '100' THEN 5 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PL' THEN 6 END AS STEPRANK , TSS_CD, PGS_STEP_CD, TSS_ST, PK_WBS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST) X) Y WHERE OVER_STEP_RANK = 1)
AND M.TSS_SCN_CD = ISNULL(#{tssScnCd}, 'G') --과제구분코드(G:일반, N , O) AND M.DEL_YN = 'N' --삭제여부 AND 1 = 1 AND M.PGS_STEP_CD IN ('PG', 'AL') --진행상태코드(PL:계획, PG:진행, CM:완료, AL: 변경, DC:중단) ) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_CD = #{prjCd} order by z.TSS_STRT_DD desc, z.TSS_FNH_DD desc
-- retrieveToMonPrj 프로젝트 전월마감 체크 SELECT COUNT(PRJ_STR_DT) AS cnt FROM IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST WHERE PRJ_CD = #{prjCd} AND PRJ_STR_DT > CONVERT(NVARCHAR(7), DATEADD(MM, -1, getdate()), 23)
-- retrievePrjMmCls 프로젝트 전월마감 체크 SELECT COUNT(PRJ_CLS_YYMM) AS cnt FROM IRIS_PRJ_RSST_CLS WHERE PRJ_CD = #{prjCd} AND PRJ_CLS_YYMM = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(7), DATEADD(MM, -1, #{searchMonth}+'-01'), 23)

-- retrievePrjClsProgSearchInfo 프로젝트 월마감 상세조회 SELECT TSS_NM as tssNm ,SA_USER_NAME as saUserName ,DEPT_NAME as deptName ,TSS_STRT_DD as tssStrtDd ,TSS_FNH_DD as tssFnhDd ,PROGRESSRATE as progressrateReal FROM iris_prj_cls_prog WHERE PRJ_CD = #{prjCd} AND PRJ_CLS_YYMM = #{searchMonth}
